structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The city legislative body may provide by ordinance such provisions and stipulations for the administration of the income and revenues of the waterworks and for the security of the bondholders as it deems necessary.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2741L-17, 2741L-39.
